DOC.brief_title: School-based Comprehensive Suicide Intervention Shanghai , China
DOC.detailed_description: A total 3000 student two junior school ( grade 7 8 ) two senior school ( grade 10 11 ) Shanghai Pu Dong district recruit study . All student randomly assign universal study group universal control group class level . In two group , high risk suicidal student identify screen . A universal suicide intervention conduct universal study group ; indicate suicide intervention conduct indicated study group . All student universal study group universal control group complete self-administered questionnaire 6 month end universal intervention . High risk suicidal student indicate study group indicate control group complete another self-administered questionnaire , 6 month 18 month end indicate intervention .
